article_title: Watchdog Report: Nursing home care in question after two deaths in Westborough

article_metadata.description: WESTBOROUGH — In an effort to improve care for elderly in nursing homes, state officials say they are moving to hire more inspectors and levy fines on facilities that fail patients. The steps come as a national nursing home watchdog group is poised to downgrade the state's performance rating for nursing home care.In Central Massachusetts, two deaths last year got regulators' attention and highlight the need for better care, a Telegram & Gazette investigation has found.An 89-year-
article_metadata.author: Elaine Thompson  Telegram & Gazette Staff
